events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision on the highway during rush hour.
Claim categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the description included keywords such as vehicle and collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim with immediate effect.
Acknowledged the claim filing and assured customer of prompt assistance to process vehicle damages.
Requested police report, photos of damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
Received all requested documents, including official police report and detailed images of the vehicle damage.
Initiated investigation to validate accident circumstances and verify all submitted information.
Completed investigation confirming the claim details and verifying customer was not at fault in the collision.
Proposed a settlement amount covering full repair costs along with a rental car for the interim period.
Customer responded positively expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and service quality.
Approved the claim after positive customer feedback and completed all internal evaluations successfully.
Issued payment to the customerâ€™s repair shop to cover all damages as per approved settlement agreement.
Closed the claim officially after confirming customer vehicle was repaired and payment successfully processed.
Archived the claim documents and records in the system for future reference and compliance needs.
